item.title: About Epistemophilia
item.description: I am currently a sophomore student majoring in computer science. This blog is a record of my study in SHU. If you find any problem in my blogs, feel free to contact with me. the Meaning of Epistemophilia Epistemophilia simply implies the excessive striving for or preoccuption with knowledge. And I am using this name to urge myself to dig deep into the ocean of knowledge. Thanks for reading!
